name: Insert Coin(s) + L.V. "Las Venturas" New Era 9FIFTY - BLK/WHT
description:
Inspired by one of the greatest video game franchises of all time & produced in collaboration with Insert Coin(s), the best & most fun bar in Las Vegas. [This hat is also available at Insert Coin(s) in Downtown Las Vegas.] 

Details: New Era 9FIFTY Snapback (Adjustable) Hat. 100% Cotton. Imported. Limited.

name: Runnin' Hunter - BLK Tee
description:
Inspired by one of our favorite movies of all time & one of our favorite authors/journalists, who unfortunately took his own life in 2005 (R.I.P.). It was designed by our good friend John Devilman (johndevilman.com), who also designed our "Wolfpack of One" tees & tanks. Run, Hunter, Run!

Details: 
Printed in very LIMITED quantities on Fine Jersey Tees (100% Cotton), Learned Vices "chip logo" label sewn on left sleeve & Made in the U.S.A.

Care Instructions:
Machine Wash COLD inside-out with Like-Colors, Tumble Dry Low

name: Runnin' Hunter - BLK Tank
description:
Inspired by one of our favorite movies of all time & one of our favorite authors/journalists, who unfortunately took his own life in 2005 (R.I.P.). It was designed by our good friend John Devilman (johndevilman.com), who also designed our "Wolfpack of One" tees & tanks. Run, Hunter, Run!

name: Wolfpack of One - BLK Tee
description:
Inspired by UNLV's original mascot, Beauregard, but updated for 2013 (less pro-confederate army & slightly more rebellious) by our good friend, John Devilman (johndevilman.com), who also designed our "Runnin' Hunter" tees & tanks. We still love "Hey Reb!", but this new Beau KNOWS how to be a rebel too...Go REBELS!

Details: 
Printed in very LIMITED quantities on Fine Jersey Tees (100% Cotton), Learned Vices "chip logo" label sewn on left sleeve & Made in the U.S.A.

Care Instructions:
Machine Wash COLD inside-out with Like-Colors, Tumble Dry Low

name: L.L.C. New Era 9FIFTY - GRAY
description:
Over 3 years in the making, inspired by a logo idea that my dad suggested a couple months before he passed away (Thanks, Pops!)...it's the Learned Vices "Leaf Lovers Club" New Era 9Fifty snapback!!! Buy one (or all three) of our "LLC"  member's only hats & join our club...and if you see another "LLC" member wearin' one of these, don't forget to give him/her a HIGH Five (aka our secret handshake). Welcome to the club!

Details: New Era 9FIFTY Snapback (Adjustable) Hat. 100% Cotton. Imported.

name: Str8 Outta Vega$ New Era 9Fifty - BLK
description:
Inspired by the hats worn by the late great gangsta rap legend, EAZY MUTHAPHUKIN' E!!! The man who put Compton on the map & also introduced the world to Bone Thugs...we will never forget you, rest in power, homie! & kids, please learn from Eaze's mistakes...WRAP IT UP EVERY DAMN TIME!!! You never know & it ain't worth your life. #LRNDVCS

DISCLAIMER: Jheri Curl Sold Separately.

Details: New Era 9FIFTY Snapback (Adjustable) Hat. 100% Cotton. Imported. Limited.

name: 1st Rounders New Era 9FIFTY - PURP/MINT
description:
Inspired by the hats worn by Larry Johnson, Stacey Augmon & Greg Anthony during the 1991 NBA Draft. UNLV became the 4th team in NBA history to have 3 players drafted in the 1st Round & the FIRST school to produce 3 lottery picks in the same draft (#1, #9 & #12)!!! But you don't have to be a UNLV fan to be a fan of this New Era 9Fifty snapback hat...there's plenty of colorways to choose from. (Don't see your favorite teams' colors? More colorways coming soon.) 

BONUS: FREE Larry Johnson or Stacey Augmon ROOKIE card with each hat order (while supplies last)!!!

Details: New Era 9FIFTY Snapback (Adjustable) Hat. 100% Cotton. Imported.

name: GandHIGH - RED
description:
"Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi

This quote is the ethos of Learned Vices. Life's short, have fun, be happy, read everything you can & love everyone. It's not that hard. Gandhi was an amazing person & he inspired many people, including President Barrack Obama & M.L.K. Jr. & he also inspired me to make this shirt...Gandhi R.I.P. 

Details: 
Printed in very LIMITED quantities on Fine Jersey Tees (100% Cotton), Learned Vices "chip logo" label sewn on left sleeve & Made in the U.S.A.

Care Instructions:
Machine Wash COLD inside-out with Like-Colors, Tumble Dry Low

description:
"Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi

The above quote is the ethos of Learned Vices. Life's short, have fun, be happy, read everything you can & love everyone. It's not that hard. Gandhi was an amazing person & he inspired many people, including President Barrack Obama & M.L.K. Jr. & he also inspired me to make this shirt...Gandhi R.I.P.

name: COLLEGE - RED
description:
Learned (lrnid)

Adjective: 
1. (of a person) Having much knowledge acquired by study.
2. Showing, requiring, or characterized by learning; scholarly: "an article in a learned journal".

Synonyms: erudite - scholarly - lettered - educated - wise

EVERYONE should go to college, even if it's just for a semester or two to "try it out." I guess I can probably thank Hollywood for biting me with the college bug at an early age...Animal House, Revenge of the Nerds...2, 3 & IV(!), Back to School, The Program, Higher Learning, PCU, With Honors, Saved by the Bell: The College Years, A Different World, Class Act, etc. helped fuel my desire to pursue HIGHER education after I earned my HS diploma. Don't be fooled, stay schooled! 

Details: 
Printed in very LIMITED quantities on Fine Jersey Tees (100% Cotton), Learned Vices "chip logo" label sewn on left sleeve & Made in the U.S.A.

Care Instructions:
Machine Wash COLD inside-out with Like-Colors, Tumble Dry Low

EVERYONE should go to college, even if it's just for a semester or two to "try it out." I guess I can probably thank Hollywood for biting me with the college bug at an early age...Animal House, Revenge of the Nerds...2, 3 & IV(!), Back to School, The Program, Higher Learning, PCU, With Honors, Saved by the Bell: The College Years, A Different World, Class Act, etc. helped fuel my desire to pursue HIGHER education after I earned my HS diploma. Don't be fooled, stay schooled!

name: F.S.C. - RED
description:
Ol' Blue Eyes might have sang about few other cities, but he definitely LOVED Las Vegas (he even owned 9% of the Sands Hotel & Casino for a bit) and our city wouldn't be the same without him. Frank, The Rat Pack & his other Hollywood friends helped Vegas evolve from a cowboy town to a place that basically everyone in the world wanted to be at. "The Voice" even helped recruit for the UNLV Runnin' Rebels back when Tark The Shark was our coach. Plus he helped raise $5 million for the UNLV athletic program & was also presented an honorary doctorate in 1976. Thanks, Dr. Chairman...RRREEEBBBEEELLLSSS!!!

Details: 
Printed in very LIMITED quantities on Fine Jersey Tees (100% Cotton), Learned Vices "chip logo" label sewn on left sleeve & Made in the U.S.A.

Care Instructions:
Machine Wash COLD inside-out with Like-Colors, Tumble Dry Low

name: B.O.I. - RED
description:
My friends & I have gotten into many arguments (maybe even a fight or two) over trivial & stupid things that usually started with the proposition "Wanna BET ON IT?". Really, what's the harm of a friendly wager between friends...fantasy leagues, poker nights, pickup basketball games, MMA/boxing matches, etc.? It's usually all fun & games 'til somebody gets hurt. Words of advice, never bet what you can't afford to lose, bro's before ho's & money isn't everything.

Details: 
Printed in very LIMITED quantities on Fine Jersey Tees (100% Cotton), Learned Vices "chip logo" label sewn on left sleeve & Made in the U.S.A.

Care Instructions:
Machine Wash COLD inside-out with Like-Colors, Tumble Dry Low

name: S.R.D. - RED
description:
This shirt was inspired by the old sign of a small casino on The LV Strip next to Circus Circus whose original owner allegedly showed both the Kansas City & Chicago mob families how to skim money from all the LV casinos in the 70's. As a reward in 1983, he received a 15 year prison sentence. We hope that you'll wear this shirt proud, let the world know how you feel & stay away from those dumb sluts (or at least wrap it up, B)! Thanks & you're welcome. 

Details: 
Printed in very LIMITED quantities on Fine Jersey Tees (100% Cotton), Learned Vices "chip logo" label sewn on left sleeve & Made in the U.S.A.

Care Instructions:
Machine Wash COLD inside-out with Like-Colors, Tumble Dry Low
